locations.name: Home
locations.description:
Player starts off in the living room standing. You need to make it to work before 9:00AM 
You need to head to work now. Will you drive your car or take the bus?

locations.name: Bus
locations.description: You step onto the bus, and as you approach the driver, you notice a friendly smile on their face. The bus driver seems approachable and ready to assist you.

locations.name: Seat
locations.description:
You are near the first stop, eyes immediately drawn to the bellcord running along the windows. That simple cord represents your exit strategy, your ticket to disembarking at what you hope will be the right stop for work. 
Your hand hovers near the cord, ready to pull when the moment feels right. 
Or do you stay and keep riding towards Bus Stop 2?

locations.name: Bus Stop 2
locations.description:
You are near the second stop, eyes immediately drawn to the pull cord running along the windows. That simple cord represents your exit strategy, your ticket to disembarking at what you hope will be the right stop for work. 
Your hand hovers near the cord, ready to pull when the moment feels right. 
Or do you stay and keep riding towards Bus Stop 2?

locations.name: Bus Stop 3
locations.description: You are near the third stop, eyes immediately drawn to the pull cord running along the windows. That simple cord represents your exit strategy, your ticket to disembarking at what you hope will be the right stop for work. Your hand hovers near the cord, ready to pull when the moment feels right.

locations.name: Wrong Stop
locations.description:
You get off the bus, but you don't know where you are. You certainly are nowhere near DRW. You got off on the wrong stop You wander for a bit until you see familiar buildings. 
DELAYED: 15 minutes.
HEAD DOWNTOWN

locations.name: Downtown
locations.description: A bustling Chicago skyline with the Willis Tower, as you rush through busy streets on your first day, hoping to arrive on time

locations.name: Coffee Shop
locations.description: At a cozy coffee shop, a latte sets a positive tone for your first day

locations.name: Car
locations.description: Inside car. You deicede to hop on the HIGHWAY this time to try to get to work quickly

locations.name: Highway
locations.description:
On the highway. Traffic doesnt seem too bad, but the lane to your right seems to be going a bit faster.
Will you stay in this CURRENT LANE, or switch to the RIGHT LANE?

locations.name: Normal Drive
locations.description:
Suprisingly, the highway seems clear at this part. Your drive is going normally.
Will you stay in this CURRENT LANE, or switch to the RIGHT LANE?

locations.name: Normal Drive 2
locations.description:
Suprisingly, the highway seems clear at this part. Your drive is going normally.
Will you stay in this CURRENT LANE, or switch to the RIGHT LANE?

locations.name: Normal Drive 3
locations.description:
Suprisingly, the highway seems clear at this part. Your drive is going normally.
Time to head into Downtown to find PARKING

locations.name: Construction Event
locations.description: Construction on the highway delays your commute by 20 minutes on your first day.

locations.name: Traffic Event
locations.description: Highway gridlock adds a 15-minute delay to your first day at work

locations.name: Accident Event
locations.description: Accident ahead. Expect a 15-minute delay, likely to make you late. But at least you're close to DOWNTOWN and can start to find PARKING soon.

locations.name: Find Parking
locations.description: Park close pay, Park far walk. There are many options for parking downtown. You can park CLOSE for more, and get to work faster, or park FAR for cheap, but spend more time walking to the DRW building

locations.name: Parking Close
locations.description: Parked nearby, but pricey. Walk to first day, hoping it's worth it

locations.name: Parking Far
locations.description: Affordable parking far away. Rushing to the office, first-day urgency

locations.name: DRW
locations.description: You made it to work on time. Hooray!

locations.name: On time
locations.description: Arriving on time at DRW building, relief washes over you. Ready for a promising first day

locations.name: Late
locations.description: Late at DRW building, dread replaces relief on your first day
